explains: v. 使浮起，使漂起；鼓励，使有信心；使保持高价；支持，使更成功；用浮标指示，为……设浮标
wordGroup: mooring buoy 系泊浮筒；系船浮筒
life buoy 救生圈；救生衣

sentences.en: The buoy floated back and forth in the water.
We tried to throw a life buoy. She could not grab it.
sentences.cn: 我们试着扔救生圈给她，但是她抓不住。

sentences.en: Electrical equipment monitors the power the buoy generates.
sentences.cn: 电子设备监测浮标的发电情况。
